description:
The main objective of this study is to characterize the inflammatory proteins, gene
      polymorphisms, and transcriptome profiles in patients with erythema migrans to gain better
      insight into pathogenesis of early Lyme borreliosis and to define new immune modulators that
      could serve as biomarkers of disease activity.
title: Inflammatory Proteins, Gene Polymorphisms, and Transcriptome Profiles in Patients With Erythema Migrans
